title: Caught a dirty account seller

embed.description: PAX JAX. PAX TF. My Price is just what i think the account is worth in money spent limited skins and all champions owned, so just. decide if the rare skins are worth the extra money or not. skins i own. | eBay!

body: He wasn't the smartest and included clean screenshots of his own username / money spent etc.

replies.body: Thanks for the heads up! I'll be sure to forward this over to the right people.
